steps.title: Sample oval method.
steps.content: Sample oval method.

steps.title: Create an angular horizontal oval.
steps.content: Create an angular horizontal oval.

steps.title: Place two similar-sized circles for the wheels of the car overlapping the base-line of the oval.
steps.content: Place two similar-sized circles for the wheels of the car overlapping the base-line of the oval.

steps.title: Make a straight angular line joining the left and right extremes of the oval.
steps.content: Make a straight angular line joining the left and right extremes of the oval.

steps.title: Draw straight angular lines connected to each other as shown.
steps.content: Draw straight angular lines connected to each other as shown.

steps.title: Join a short angular line from the base at the left to the edge on the roof.
steps.content: Join a short angular line from the base at the left to the edge on the roof.

steps.title: Create short straight lines for the guides to the seats and the rear-view mirror.
steps.content: Create short straight lines for the guides to the seats and the rear-view mirror.

steps.title: Come down to the wheels and draw further circles within the outline.
steps.content: Come down to the wheels and draw further circles within the outline.

steps.title: From the centre of the wheels create spoke-lines all around.
steps.content: From the centre of the wheels create spoke-lines all around.

steps.title: Create three lines joining each other at the rear of the car.
steps.content: Create three lines joining each other at the rear of the car.

steps.title: Draw step by step every line in detail.
steps.content: Draw step by step every line in detail.

steps.title: Erase all guidelines.
steps.content: Erase all guidelines.

steps.title: Color the car.
steps.content: Color the car.

steps.title: Sample line method.
steps.content: Sample line method.

steps.title: Make a couple of angular lines parallel to each other.
steps.content: Make a couple of angular lines parallel to each other.

steps.title: Join them with opposite lines to form a slanted box for the bonnet.
steps.content: Join them with opposite lines to form a slanted box for the bonnet.

steps.title: Join the box with another one for the guide to the wind screen.
steps.content: Join the box with another one for the guide to the wind screen.

steps.title: Join a couple of lines for the roof and the slanted back of the car.
steps.content: Join a couple of lines for the roof and the slanted back of the car.

steps.title: Stretch a line across the body of the car from the base of the wind screen.
steps.content: Stretch a line across the body of the car from the base of the wind screen.

steps.title: Taking the above created line as the base, draw the glass window.
steps.content: Taking the above created line as the base, draw the glass window.

steps.title: Attach a rectangle from the edge of the bonnet.
steps.content: Attach a rectangle from the edge of the bonnet.

steps.title: Complete the guide to the body of the car.
steps.content: Complete the guide to the body of the car.

steps.title: Draw ovals for the wheels.
steps.content: Draw ovals for the wheels.

steps.title: Make a couple of further ovals within the wheel outlines.
steps.content: Make a couple of further ovals within the wheel outlines.

steps.title: Draw the spoke-guides.
steps.content: Draw the spoke-guides.

steps.title: Add lines at the bottom of the wheels for the tyre-thickness.
steps.content: Add lines at the bottom of the wheels for the tyre-thickness.

steps.title: Add headlight areas and a rear-view mirror with irregular boxes.
steps.content: Add headlight areas and a rear-view mirror with irregular boxes.

steps.title: Draw all necessary details.
steps.content: Draw all necessary details.

steps.title: Erase outlines.
steps.content: Erase outlines.

steps.title: Color the Lamborghini.
steps.content: Color the Lamborghini.

steps.title: Sample sketching method.
steps.content: Sample sketching method.

steps.title: Draw an oval for the car's midsection.
steps.content: Draw an oval for the car's midsection.

steps.title: Draw a semi rectangular shape on both sides of the oval (Make the left part longer).
steps.content: Draw a semi rectangular shape on both sides of the oval (Make the left part longer).

steps.title: Draw two ovals for the wheels.
steps.content: Draw two ovals for the wheels.

steps.title: Draw a semi trapezoid for the windshield and an oval with sharp edges for the windows.
steps.content: Draw a semi trapezoid for the windshield and an oval with sharp edges for the windows.

steps.title: Draw another set of semi trapezoids for the headlights and front panels.
steps.content: Draw another set of semi trapezoids for the headlights and front panels.

steps.title: Draw two semi rectangular shapes for the side mirrors.
steps.content: Draw two semi rectangular shapes for the side mirrors.

steps.title: Draw another semi rectangular shape for the doors.
steps.content: Draw another semi rectangular shape for the doors.

steps.title: Based on the outline, draw the main body of the Lamborghini
steps.content: Based on the outline, draw the main body of the Lamborghini

steps.title: Add details to the cars headlights, rims, wiper and side panels.
steps.content: Add details to the cars headlights, rims, wiper and side panels.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Color your Lamborghini!
steps.content: Color your Lamborghini!

steps.title: Sample trapezoid method.
steps.content: Sample trapezoid method.

steps.title: Draw a 3D trapezoid shape.
steps.content: Draw a 3D trapezoid shape.

steps.title: Reciprocate the trapezoid facing the opposite direction.
steps.content: Reciprocate the trapezoid facing the opposite direction.

steps.title: Draw two ovals for the wheels.
steps.content: Draw two ovals for the wheels.

steps.title: Draw the body contours of the car based on the shapes drawn previously.
steps.content: Draw the body contours of the car based on the shapes drawn previously.

steps.title: Draw an oval with sharp two sharp edges for the window and add line streaks at the back for the engine exhaust.
steps.content: Draw an oval with sharp two sharp edges for the window and add line streaks at the back for the engine exhaust.

steps.title: Draw a series of semi rectangles and lines for the back portion of the Lamborghini.
steps.content: Draw a series of semi rectangles and lines for the back portion of the Lamborghini.

steps.title: Based on the outline, draw the main body of the Lamborghini
steps.content: Based on the outline, draw the main body of the Lamborghini

steps.title: Add details to the Lamborghini.
steps.content: Add details to the Lamborghini.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Color your Lamborghini!
steps.content: Color your Lamborghini!
